name: mobx-react
description: React bindings for MobX. Create fully reactive components.

scripts.build: webpack && cp src/index.d.ts index.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts native.d.ts && cp src/index.d.ts custom.d.ts
scripts.test: webpack && browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js | tape-run | tap-spec && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.travis: webpack && browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js | tape-run && tsc -p test/ts
scripts.debug: webpack && browserify -x react/addons -x react/lib/ReactContext -x react/lib/ExecutionEnvironment test/*.js | tape-run --browser chrome | tap-spec

author: Michel Weststrate
